item.title: Making a Verlet Physics Engine in Javascript
item.description: Have you ever wondered if you can make your own physics engine in JavaScript? If so, you have come to the right place. We are going to build a Physics engine from scratch in JavaScript. Before we start, I should mention that this tutorial assumes you have a good understanding of Vectors. Don’t worry if you do not yet have this understanding — Vectors are simple: get the Vector.js. What Is Verlet Physics?
